timeline.message:
Introduced method SessionConnector.isContinueInitOnError()
 to be used by AbstractSocketInitiator and AbstractSocketAcceptor.

Changed AbstractSocketAcceptor.createSessions() to check if
 `continueInitOnError` is active.

(Not a big fan of catching general `Throwable` but made code as similar
as possible to AbstractSocketInitiator. Could be changed later.)
Added test to MultiAcceptorTest and converted test to JUnit4 style.

timeline.author: the-thing
